name: EdgeLords
description:
Teetering on the brink of existance lies the realm called the 'Edge'. Inhabited by only the hardiest of sorceresses. But there's only room for one EdgeLord!

EdgeLords is a boss-rush strategy card game with card battler and deck-building elements, where two sorceresses fling spells at one another and summon minions to fight for dominance.

A totally unique take on the deck-building genre, with hundreds of cards to discover and play! As well as climax powers that unleash devastating abilities!

Enjoy a fully voiced and animated hentai animation for every opponent you defeat on your path to total supremacy as you harvest their 'essence' and turn them into subservient thralls draped around the Edge Lord throne.




Death. Doom. Destruction. All will fall before her Dark Legion as she instigates the apocalypse and ends the world. Deathgrip is a gothic duluhan and her signature attack Reaper's Blade, which gains a Soul Gem card each time its played.


Under the hidden grove, deep within the tree of life lies the fountain where Melonie, the love fairy can be found. Her volumptious body is irresistable, giving her opponent's decks Temptation cards that are often too good to turn down.


The most powerful warlock in the realm. Ashka is an arrogant, smug brat. Her spells are devastating, especially Concussive Blast - each time its played, its damage increases!


Emerging from the flaming portal in the forbidden woods, Lilith is an assassin sent from the demon realm to claim the title of Lord. What she lacks in magic, she makes up for in action economy. Brace yourself for Hedonic Rush, which usually precedes another attack straight away.

Features

  • 200+ playable cards
  • 50+ summonable glyphs, allies and minions
  • 4 playable characters, each with 4 erotic outfits that change their deck archtype
  • 12 unlockable fully animated, multi-stage, interactive hentai loops
  • Multiple languages will be supported
  • Custom full illustration by DankoDeadZone
  • Full voice acting from Vexoria The Sun Eater (Deathgrip), GinnyFantasy (Melonie), Wubcake (Ashka) and GinaGalore (Lilith)
